Method Detail

afterPropertiesSet

void afterPropertiesSet()

cleanUp

public def cleanUp(def session)
Cleanup recaptcha resources associated with the session.
param:
session The current session.

createCaptcha

public def createCaptcha(def session, def props)
Creates HTML containing all necessary markup for displaying a ReCapture object
param:
session The current session. Used for short term storage of the recaptcha object and any error messages.
param:
props Properties used to construct the HTML. See http://recaptcha.net/apidocs/captcha/client.html for valid properties.
return:
HTML code, suitable for embedding into a webpage.

validationFailed

public def validationFailed(def session)
Determine if the previous verification attempt failed.
param:
session The current session

verifyAnswer

public def verifyAnswer(def session, def remoteAddress, def params)
Verify a ReCaptcha answer.
param:
session The current session.
param:
remoteAddress The address of the browser submitting the answer.
param:
params Parameters supplied by the browser.
return:
True if the supplied answer is correct, false otherwise. Returns true if ReCaptcha support is disabled.
